name: Haunted House (itch) (saitoki)
description:
A super short visual novel about exploring a haunted house.

Rating: PG

Features: ~2.5k words, 3 CG and 3 ending

Engine: Renpy

This is a small,  sketchy  game originally  developed entirely on Android phone and later get ported to Renpy

Update 27/12/20: fixed some name tag mistakes
